backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no implemented methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a voice countdown feature to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated descriptions of all frontend files for reference and build planning.
frontend/index.css: Root CSS variables and Tailwind base layers defining light/dark theme tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point wiring the root div, manifest, favicon, and main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, and standalone launch behavior.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app shell with header, tabbed footer navigation, and route layout using TanStack Router.
Visual breathing circle showing countdown text, phase colors, and animations tied to engine state.
frontend/src/components/charts/BreathHol: Generates an SVG line chart visualizing breath-hold durations over time, with points and date labels.
frontend/src/components/charts/WeeklyMin: Displays a weekly bar chart of minutes spent, scaling bar heights relative to the max value.
frontend/src/components/CustomPatternFor: Form for editing inhale/hold/exhale durations in a custom breathing pattern.
frontend/src/components/ExerciseTileCard: Clickable exercise tile with title, description, icon, and info button for home screen grids.
frontend/src/components/HomeExerciseCard: Home exercise card with adjustable duration dialog, clickable start action, and accessibility keys.
frontend/src/components/SessionList.tsx: Renders a table of breathing sessions with formatted dates and durations, or a placeholder message when empty.
frontend/src/components/VerticalVolumeCo: Vertical slider component for adjusting a numeric value with optional icon display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBreathingEngine.ts: Manages breathing phase timing, voice cues, haptics, and start/pause/resume logic for breathing exercises.
frontend/src/hooks/useHaptics.ts: Provides a simple vibration helper using the browser’s vibrate API.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Handles Internet Identity authentication state, login flow, and identity persistence through context.
frontend/src/hooks/usePerExerciseDuratio: Stores and retrieves per‑exercise duration settings using local storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: Requests and manages a screen wake lock while a given activity is active.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles, theme variables, typography rules, and animations for breathing UI effects.
frontend/src/lib/ambientAudio.ts: Controls looping rain and waves audio playback with exclusive play behavior and adjustable volume.
frontend/src/lib/breathingPatterns.ts: Defines the BreathingPattern interface and preset breathing patterns such as equal, box, and 4‑7‑8.
frontend/src/lib/localStorageStore.ts: Provides helpers to read and write breath-hold records, breathing sessions, and per‑exercise durations in localStorage with safe fallbacks.
frontend/src/lib/playerDurationGuards.ts: Validates session durations and determines when auto‑stop is allowed to prevent premature termination.
frontend/src/lib/sessionTypes.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for breath‑hold records and breathing sessions.
frontend/src/lib/statsDerivations.ts: Calculates daily minutes, breath‑hold chart data, and returns the last 10 sessions from stored records.
frontend/src/lib/storageKeys.ts: Exports constant keys used for localStorage entries.
frontend/src/lib/voiceGuidance.ts: Controls speech synthesis for voice guidance, including volume, queued speech, async speech, and cancelation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Renders the About page with app info, premium upsell, and static settings display.
frontend/src/pages/Custom.tsx: Lets users build a custom breathing pattern and start it via navigation to the player.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Displays preset breathing patterns, manages per‑exercise durations, and links to the test and player screens.
frontend/src/pages/Player.tsx: Runs the breathing session player, loading pattern data, managing audio, voice, duration, logging sessions, and auto‑stop behavior.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Renders settings UI for audio, haptics, and notifications using switches and cards with navigation back to home.
frontend/src/pages/Stats.tsx: Displays weekly breathing minutes, breath-hold chart, and recent sessions by loading local history and rendering charts and a table.
frontend/src/pages/Test.tsx: Implements a breath-hold timer with start/stop controls, persists records, and shows the all‑time best duration.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on load to enable PWA functionality.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, screens, fonts, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s feature inventory, metadata, and high‑level summary of the ZenBreathe app.
